name: applications/oskari2/ol3/index

out: This value is overwritten when running 'grunt buildApp:../applications/oskari2/ol3/', but for completeness here is a working example for manual builds that creates the following file when this comment is removed. '../dist/oskari2/ol3/oskari.min.js'
